cookies.name: Cookie Monster Cookie
cookies.description: With a signature blue vanilla dough that stands out for all the best reasons and a incredible lineups of mix-ins like caramel bites, oreos, mini marshmallows, and chocolate chips.

cookies.name: Rudolph's Favorite Cookie
cookies.description: This red cookie will certainly be the first to catch your eye. Red velvet dough with savory creamcheese chip. Do not mistake her density for merely surface-level indulgence.

cookies.name: Chocolate Mint Cookie
cookies.description: Our take on a favorite flavor combo. A warm dark chocolate cookie with mint chips and chunks of milk chocolate.

cookies.name: Ginger Delight Cookie
cookies.description: Fall in love with our tender molasses cookie with sweet spices of cinnamon and nutmeg and complimenting flavor of the spicy ginger. Sprinkled with large granulated sugar to make them just as beautiful as they are delicious.

cookies.name: Peanut Butter Cookie
cookies.description: A total peanut butter stunner. Our soft, sweet peanut butter cookie filled with creamy peanut butter chips.

cookies.name: Oatmeal Rasin Cookie
cookies.description: A treat that's like a hug for the soul. Warm cinnamon and sweet molasses layered with plenty of oatmeal and raisins.

cookies.name: Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookie
cookies.description: A vegan double chocolate cookie with the same levels of dark chocolate decadence and melty (dairy-free) chocolate chunks.

cookies.name: Vegan Confetti Cookie
cookies.description: Sweet vanilla and all of the sprinkles make this an extra special vegan treat for an extra special day.
